name: Serrow1
review: Server has a good balance between helpful quality of life and classic adventuring elements keeping close to the original. I will continue to enjoy playing on this incredible server. 10/10 would recommend.

name: JustSomeTobyFan
review: Definitely would recommend, this server is Ricardo Millos friendly. You can reach out GM Hector, GM panic, Arias, and me for more Ricardo stuffs. Jokes aside, [but I am not joking thou..], Probably one of the most balanced server for renewal.

name: mvpcardholder
review: Been here for quite some time and have seen the server through ups and downs. All kinds of dramas too, some good, some bad. Overall a pretty fun server and I highly recommend it to anyone interested in having a shot of having a decently paced and progressive experience. GMs will listen to you if you know how to present your case which is also a plus.
